author: Simon Difford
description: Not the most endearing of names but this spirituous late-night sipper has broad family appeal beyond just uncles, so long as they have a taste for bittersweet peaty whisky. OK, perhaps just the discerning among the family circle.
name: Drunk Uncle
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
